name: sampleproject_using_nodehotkey
description: This is a sample project to built using NodeHotKey.

scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev nodemon -e js,ts -w ./src --exec "yarn run build && yarn run start"
scripts.prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=prod nodemon -e js,ts -w ./src --exec "yarn run build && yarn run start"

author: Rubinder Singh
